item.title: A Beginnerâ€™s Guide to Building Outdoor Light Shows Synchronized to Music with Open Source Tools
item.description: A Docker staff solutions architect shares their experience building DIY holiday light displays synchronized to music, offering a step-by-step guide for anyone looking to create their own dazzling show. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/a-beginners-guide-to-building-outdoor-light-shows-open-source-tools/
